messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Um, see, uh, a good thing, man. I got it, uh, you know, I gotta put you on something. Hold on a second.
Okay, I'm here. What's going on?
There's a shooting at 242 Lines Avenue. Multiple gunshots. Two people shot.
Okay, and now I'm getting some more details. Can you clarify the address?
Yes, 163, 155 Kevin. It's near Weekway Avenue. Multiple people shot.
Got it. You mentioned Weekway Avenue and Lines Avenue. How many people are injured?
At least three people shot. I see people on the ground.
Understood. Are you in a safe location?
Yes, I'm inside a store nearby. There's a guy shot in the head inside here.
Can you please confirm the store's name?
It's the chicken store on Weekway and Clinton Place.
EMS and police are on the way. Can you confirm if there's a police officer shot as well?
Yes, I believe a police officer was shot.
Please stay where you are. Help is coming. Can you provide any description of the shooters?
I couldn't see them clearly. It happened so fast.
Understood. We've got multiple units responding. Please avoid the crime scene and stay on the line if safe to do so.
Okay, thanks. There's a lot of people gathering outside.
Can you move to a back area or somewhere safe and secluded in the store?
Yeah, I'm moving to the back now.
Great. You're doing the right thing. Help is on its way, stay calm.
Thank you.
You're welcome. Stay with me until the authorities arrive.
